item.title: About
item.description: My name is Sean McKernan. This is my blog. Mainly writing about my learning experiences with Linux and security, with the goal of sharing knowledge. This blog is build using the Hugo static site generator, and hosted on a VPS running nginx to serve the content. Theme credit: smol

item.title: First Post
item.description: Introduction This is Bold text, and this is emphasized text. Visit the Hugo website!
